attributes.action: investigate a significant shortfall to the projected income of endowment policy with profits at maturity, and make the shareholders, or owners answerable for the loss incurred by the policy holders within last ten years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Within last 5 to 10 years, some insurance companies did not declare bonuses for "with Profit" policies, citing economic conditions. This did not deter the shareholders from awarding profits to themselves. I believe it is unethical for them to have made profits without sharing it with their clients.
